author: Stephen Coccarelli

review: Yes it worked easily, instructions are very simple. I just had a little difficulty to open the battery compartment, but finally I opened it.
author: Eduardo Saleh

review: This thing buffers more than it played video. Returned it
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love it!! Great product and great price. Wasn't priced as promised with the "Amazon Prime Day" pricing so I had to pay full price for it but still a great product.
author: Vito Pecoraro

review: I am not a heavy user of Fire TV Stick, but I have been satisfied with it.I use the stick on the opposite end of the house from our ISP provided router w/ wireless. Needless to say, it is not the strongest.The stick has worked as well if not better than my older Roku I use on with an older TV and RCA type connections.As a non-power user, I would not personally say Fire TV is better or worse than Roku, both have been satisfactory for my use watching Amazon Prime and YouTube.Primary use: Amazon Prime/Instant video and YouTube, occasional Plex streaming.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This was easy to set up, and the menu is intuitive. I have not yet tested this in a hotel, which was one of the reasons I chose this unit as it is supposed to be able to work on hotel systems. meanwhile, does what it says it should.
author: Tom Paine
